mapper.select: SELECT a.SEQ, a.ANSWERBOARD_NAME , a.TITLE, a.REGDATE, u.EMAIL FROM USERINFO u JOIN (SELECT SEQ,TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, EMAIL, ANSWERBOARD_NAME FROM ANSWERBOARD WHERE EMAIL=#{email} AND DELFLAG ='N') a ON u.EMAIL = a.EMAIL

SELECT a.SEQ, a.TITLE, a.REGDATE, a.EMAIL, a.PASSWORD , a.ANSWERBOARD_NAME, a.REPLYSTATUS FROM USERINFO u RIGHT JOIN (SELECT SEQ, EMAIL, PASSWORD, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, PARENT_SEQ, DELFLAG, ANSWERBOARD_NAME, REPLYSTATUS FROM ANSWERBOARD WHERE DELFLAG ='N') a ON u.EMAIL = a.EMAIL ORDER BY REGDATE DESC, PARENT_SEQ,SEQ
